patterns: How do I view my marks?
Where can I find my results?
I want to see my report card
What did I get in math?
responses: You can view your marks by navigating to the 'Academics' section and then clicking on 'Marks' or 'Grades'.
To see your results, please go to the 'Academics' menu and select the 'View Marks' option.

patterns: How can I download my transcript?
Where do I get my academic transcript?
I need a copy of my transcript
responses: You can download your academic transcript from the 'Academics' or 'Reports' section. Look for an option like 'Download Transcript' or 'Generate Report'.
To get your transcript, go to the 'Reports' or 'Academics' section and choose the transcript option.

patterns: What is my schedule for today?
responses: Your class schedule is available under the 'Timetable' section in the main menu.
You can check your daily schedule by visiting the 'Timetable' page.

patterns: How do I check my attendance?
Where can I see my attendance?
Check if I was marked present
responses: Your attendance record can be found in the 'Attendance' section. You can see a summary and detailed view there.
Navigate to the 'Attendance' menu to view your attendance history.

patterns: How much are my school fees?
Where can I see my payment history?
responses: For information on your fees, please visit the 'Billing' or 'Fees' section. You can see outstanding balances and payment history there.
All fee-related details are in the 'Fees' section of your portal.

patterns: How do I submit an assignment?
responses: To submit an assignment, go to the 'Assignments' section, select the assignment you want to submit, and use the upload option to attach your file.
You can upload your assignments through the 'Assignments' portal. Look for a 'Submit' button next to the assignment details.

patterns: Where can I see my assignments?
responses: You can find all your current and past assignments in the 'Assignments' section of the portal.
Navigate to 'Academics' and then 'Assignments' to see your homework.

patterns: What are the upcoming school events?
Are there any events this month?
responses: Check the 'Calendar' or 'Events' section on the dashboard to see all upcoming school events.
The school calendar has all the information about upcoming events and holidays.

patterns: How do I upload a file?
How to put file on portal
responses: You can upload files in sections like 'Assignments' or 'Documents'. Look for a drag-and-drop area or an 'Upload File' button.
To upload a document, find the relevant section and use the file upload form provided.

patterns: How can I see my profile?
Where can I edit my profile?
responses: You can access your profile by clicking on your name or profile picture at the top right corner of the page.
Your profile details can be viewed and edited in the 'My Profile' section.
If you've forgotten your password, you can use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page to reset it.
For login issues, please try resetting your password or contact the school administration for assistance.
For new admissions, please visit the 'Admissions' section on the school's public website. You will find the application form and instructions there.
The admission process details are available on the 'Admissions' page of our website.

patterns: Show me the list of subjects
responses: You can find a list of all available courses and subjects under the 'Academics' or 'Courses' section of the portal.
I can help you with questions about using the Quickschool system. For example, you can ask me how to view your marks, check your timetable, or submit an assignment.
To create a new assignment, go to the 'Assignments' section and click on the 'Create Assignment' button.
You can create new assignments from the 'Academics' -> 'Assignments' menu. Look for a 'New' or 'Create' button.
To grade assignments, navigate to the 'Gradebook' or 'Assignments' section, select the assignment you want to grade, and you will see the list of submissions where you can enter grades.
You can find the grading interface in the 'Gradebook' or under each specific 'Assignment'.
To take attendance, go to the 'Attendance' section and select your class. You can then mark each student as present, absent, or late.
Attendance can be taken from the 'Attendance' module. Select the date and class to begin.

patterns: Send a message to a student
responses: You can send messages to parents and students through the 'Messaging' or 'Communication' section of the portal.
To communicate with parents or students, use the internal messaging system found under the 'Communication' menu.

patterns: How to see my class list?
responses: You can view your class list by going to the 'My Classes' or 'Academics' section and selecting the class you want to view.
Your class rosters are available under the 'Classes' menu.

patterns: How to add a new student?
How to create a teacher account?
responses: To manage users, go to the 'Admin' or 'Users' section. From there you can add, edit, or remove students, teachers, and other staff.
User management is handled in the 'Admin Panel' under 'User Accounts'. You can also reset passwords from there.

patterns: How to create a new class?
Assign a teacher to a class
responses: Class and subject management is available in the 'Admin' section under 'Academics' or 'Classes'. You can create new classes, assign teachers, and manage subjects there.
To create or edit classes, navigate to 'Admin' -> 'Classes & Subjects'.

patterns: How to generate a financial report?
responses: You can generate various reports from the 'Reports' section in the Admin dashboard. You can find financial, academic, and attendance reports there.
For reporting, please visit the 'Admin' -> 'Reports' module to generate and export data.
Admission management is handled in the 'Admissions' section of the admin portal. You can review applications and manage the admission process there.
To manage new student admissions, go to the 'Admin' -> 'Admissions' section.

patterns: How to set up fee structures?
responses: Fee management and billing configurations can be found in the 'Finance' or 'Billing' section of the Admin panel.
To configure school fees, create invoices, and track payments, navigate to 'Admin' -> 'Finance' -> 'Fee Management'.
You can manage school-wide settings from the 'Settings' or 'Configuration' area in the Admin panel.
To update school information and system settings, go to 'Admin' -> 'Settings'.
You can search for books in the 'Library' section. You can also check availability and reserve books there.
Visit the 'Library' module to search the catalog and manage your book loans.

patterns: I need to take a day off
responses: To apply for leave, go to 'Attendance' or 'Leave Management' and click on 'Apply for Leave'. Fill out the form and submit.
You can submit a leave request through the 'Leave' section on your dashboard.
The exam schedule is published under the 'Academics' -> 'Examinations' section.
You can view upcoming exam dates and schedules in the 'Examinations' module.
Transport details, including bus routes and timings, are available in the 'Transport' section.
Check the 'Transport' module for information on your assigned bus route and pickup times.
Teachers can review and approve student leave requests in the 'Leave Management' or 'Class Teacher' section.
Go to 'Attendance' -> 'Leave Requests' to approve or reject student leave applications.
You can view and download your payslips from the 'HR' or 'Payroll' section of your profile.
Salary details are available in the 'My Profile' -> 'Payroll' area.
Admin can manage staff attendance under the 'HR' -> 'Attendance' module.
To track and manage staff attendance, navigate to the 'HR' section in the Admin panel.
You can send bulk messages or emails via the 'Communication' -> 'Broadcast' tool.
To send alerts to parents, students, or staff, use the 'Broadcast' feature in the 'Communication' module.
